docs.lead_paragraph: In art and life the composer Carlo Gesualdo was a man of intrigue. Murderer and musician, he again has become the source and subject of a powerful opera experience.

headline.main: Prince, Killer and Composer,' Gesualdo' Inspires Sound and Fury

docs.lead_paragraph: At the home of Letty Cottin Pogrebin, once a "Mad Men"-era up-and-comer in the publishing field, now a renowned feminist, are several scrapbooks that could well have been the basis for several of the show's plot lines. She shared them with me as we watched the final episode together Sunday night, which I wrote about in Tuesday's Big City column.

headline.main: Letty, Groucho, Flirting and Sexism in the '60s

docs.abstract: Letty Cottin Pogrebin shares letters from Groucho Marx that in today's work environment might be looked upon askance.
docs.snippet: Letty Cottin Pogrebin shares letters from Groucho Marx that in today's work environment might be looked upon askance.

docs.lead_paragraph: There are many reasons not to start the push toward college before your child is even in preschool. You know most of them, but here's one you might not have thought of: There is no point in pushing children, because by the time today's toddlers turn 18, college -- along with the book-based world for which college prepares you -- will be an obsolete relic.
docs.abstract: An article in the most recent issue of Brain, Child magazine argues that by the time today's toddlers turn 18, the book-based world for which college prepares you will be an obsolete relic.
docs.snippet: An article in the most recent issue of Brain, Child magazine argues that by the time today's toddlers turn 18, the book-based world for which college prepares you will be an obsolete relic.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Medical Board of California held a hearing to consider revoking or suspending the physician’s license of Nadya Suleman’s fertility doctor, Michael Kamrava.

headline.main: California: Hearing Begins for Doctor in Octuplet Births
headline.print_headline: California: Hearing Begins For Doctor In Octuplet Births

docs.lead_paragraph: During last week's episode of "Mad Men'' the camera delivered a wonderful shot of Don, Faye and Megan in the offices of Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce standing far apart from one another in a perfectly composed triangle. On Sunday night during the season finale, one side of that triangle was eliminated as Don axed the mature, reflective Dr. Miller in favor of his beautiful, young secretary.

headline.main: 'Mad Men' Watch: A Whole New Kind of Cliché

docs.abstract: There are no fresh starts; there are only empty re-starts, especially for affluent, middle-aged men who take up with attractive young women as their effort at an Act II.
docs.snippet: There are no fresh starts; there are only empty re-starts, especially for affluent, middle-aged men who take up with attractive young women as their effort at an Act II.
